elements.title: What is the correct ending of the statement? Select the correct ending.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Long-term customer loyalty ...
choices: is the sole responsibility of the marketing department.
is an outdated concept and is only aimed at in small village stores.
arises exclusively during the sales talk.
requires all employees in the company to act in a customer-oriented manner.
correctAnswer: requires all employees in the company to act in a customer-oriented manner.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: To create long-term customer loyalty, ...
choices: the needs of the clientele must be analyzed.
the retail business may not change its product range.
customers should always be on first-name terms.
you must not bother customers with skillful questioning techniques.
correctAnswer: the needs of the clientele must be analyzed.

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: What requirements do businesses and retail specialists need to meet to ensure long-term customer loyalty?

elements.name: question4
elements.title: List at least four characteristics of the retail business that are important for long-term customer loyalty.
elements.correctAnswer: Product range, prices, additional services, shopping experience, staff, sustainability, location and opening hours, payment options

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Which five (main) characteristics of retail specialists do customers have high expectations of?
elements.correctAnswer: Appearance, self-competence, social competence, methodological competence, professional competence
